summary: between the motion and the act - wreckageofstars - Critical Role (Web Series) [Archive of Our Own]
title: between the motion and the act - wreckageofstars - Critical Role (Web Series) [Archive of Our Own]
excerpt: An Archive of Our Own, a project of the Organization for Transformative Works
description:
Caleb plans - and fails - to make his escape. Character study, post 2x29.

[Bad and good. Things that people are, things that people do. And him, stuck somewhere miserably in between. 

He is a bad person that has done good things. A good person that has done bad things. Just a person that has done things that are unforgivable, a person that has done things that are kind, and so – what kind of a person does that make him?]

reblog.comment:
Caleb plans - and fails - to make his escape. Character study, post 2x29.

He is a bad person that has done good things. A good person that has done bad things. Just a person that has done things that are unforgivable, a person that has done things that are kind, and so – what kind of a person does that make him?]

trail.content_raw:
Caleb plans - and fails - to make his escape. Character study, post 2x29.

[Bad and good. Things that people are, things that people do. And him, stuck somewhere miserably in between. 

He is a bad person that has done good things. A good person that has done bad things. Just a person that has done things that are unforgivable, a person that has done things that are kind, and so – what kind of a person does that make him?]
trail.content:

He is a bad person that has done good things. A good person that has done bad things. Just a person that has done things that are unforgivable, a person that has done things that are kind, and so – what kind of a person does that make him?]

summary: Dumbass question, what is critical role exactly?
question: Dumbass question, what is critical role exactly?
answer:
Oh it’s a show where a bunch of voice actors play dungeons and dragons and stream it. It’s highkey gay and super fun. If you’ve ever played a single video game you’ve probably heard all of their voices in it (like ellie from the last of us? the actress who voices her is in it!)

You can watch it for free on youtube, it’s fun even if you don’t understand dungeons and dragons (i didn’t when I first started watching so trust me on that)

tags: my heart broke a little when he said happy childhood... destroyed happy childhood
summary: Why Lorenzo shouldn’t have killed Caleb’s cat
title: Why Lorenzo shouldn’t have killed Caleb’s cat
body:
Liam’s answer about why he killed Lorenzo in Frumpkin’s name and not Molly’s was heavy… and a real Good Info Dump.

  • Caleb, as a happy little boy, had a cat named Frumpkin
  • Caleb sees himself as the one who destroyed that happy childhood
  • Familiar-Frumpkin means A LOT to him as the only one by his side for ~5 yrs after escaping the asylum
  • Mollymauk’s death affected Caleb deeply… but Caleb is in no position for romance. Not with anybody. 
  • Caleb destroyed everything good in his life. He didn’t have Nott. He was alone. Until he created Frumpkin. Who is definitely a Real Cat…

  • Caleb destroyed everything good in his life. He didn’t have Nott. He was alone. Until he created Frumpkin. Who is definitely a Real Cat…

  • Caleb sees himself as the one who destroyed that happy childhood
  • Familiar-Frumpkin means A LOT to him as the only one by his side for ~5 yrs after escaping the asylum
  • Mollymauk’s death affected Caleb deeply… but Caleb is in no position for romance. Not with anybody. 
  • Caleb destroyed everything good in his life. He didn’t have Nott. He was alone. Until he created Frumpkin. Who is definitely a Real Cat…

  • Caleb sees himself as the one who destroyed that happy childhood

tags: i hope that answered ur question i definitely drug this answer out a lot lol
summary: What’s ur opinions on them keeping molly dead? Like obviously that would be awful and shite but do you think that’s a...
question: What’s ur opinions on them keeping molly dead? Like obviously that would be awful and shite but do you think that’s a possibility anymore
answer:
uhhh well if you’re asking me if i think he’ll stay dead, im gonna tell you im 50/50. i keep changing my mind on things and thinking up different avenues matt, taliesin, and the rest of the cast could take in regards to molly’s situation. i wrote up a ramble-type post that’s saved in my drafts that kinda covers that a bit.

If they decide to keep him dead? that’s fine. i love molly a shit ton, but so does taliesin and his friends. they’re not gonna keep him dead bc they hate molly lol. im gonna respect whatever decision they come to whether i agree with it or not.

like i’ve said before i prefer for them to rezz molly and have him stick around longer. i love the parallel of him waking from the dead surrounded by family instead of all alone like he did the first time. i also think that would tie in well with the big themes of this campaign being identity and found family. it’d be a very heartwarming and healing scene especially with what everyone has been through lately.

but i get that story/rp isnt everything in dnd, and you have to look at the mechanics of the game too. the closest thing m9 has to a designated healer is jester, and that doesnt seem to be the route laura wants to take with her. but until clay showed up, she was sorta stuck in that role. with clay around she can really lean into her trickster stuff and not have to worry about spending spell slots on healing as much. this fits her character better too, and clay seems to be better built for healing stuff anyway (thanks taliesin).

im hoping matt will continue to use stuff from molly later in the campaign. whether that’s pulling threads from lucien and the tomb takers, or molly straight up waking up from the dead after m9 have buried and left him. i like the idea of him becoming an npc and matt running wild with him. p much everything tal knew about molly, we know too, but matt still has lucien/nonagon’s whole deal kept under lock and key. i’d hate for that to all get thrown away with molly gone. im definitely hoping stuff surrounding molly’s mysterious past will resurface in some way.

blog.name: crit-role-ideas
blog.title: Critical Role Character Ideas
blog.description: if you have your own ideas, please feel free to send them in, as well as any questions you may have!

summary: A recovering cultist of Vecna, possibly a warlock, that is either doing their best to push passed that moment in history with...
body: A recovering cultist of Vecna, possibly a warlock, that is either doing their best to push passed that moment in history with the whispers of the undying one still echoing in their brain, or actively trying to find a way to break the shackles of their master so they may be rewarded.

reblog.comment: A recovering cultist of Vecna, possibly a warlock, that is either doing their best to push passed that moment in history with the whispers of the undying one still echoing in their brain, or actively trying to find a way to break the shackles of their master so they may be rewarded.

tags: listen im just so scared for them all the time
summary: I’m watching the rest of the live show rn and with Shakaste returning its sort of driving home with me how far the mighty nein...
body: I’m watching the rest of the live show rn and with Shakaste returning its sort of driving home with me how far the mighty nein have come. They’re still a pretty new party but, like, they have allies now. People like Nila and Keg and Shakaste could be incredibly valuable in times ahead. They’re certainly no Allura, but just knowing that my baby party has been networking makes me feel better. Like, we’re getting somewhere guys.

summary: Mollymauk Tealeaf: the Phil Coulson of Exandria
text: Mollymauk Tealeaf: the Phil Coulson of Exandria
